attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Follow the Post Offic process for paying Travel and subsistance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Te Post Office is a trusted institution owned by the goverment with a process that has worked for a number ofyears and could easily be used for MP's.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
